definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Another Time I was trying to fill a bettIe with hot water to warm my feet before going to bed.
sentences.chinese: 又有一次，在睡覺前我想灌一瓶熱水焐腳。

definition: to enclose/to cover with the hand (one's eyes, nose or ears)/to cover up (an affair)/contrary/to contradict
to bake/to heat by fire/to set off by contrast
kang (a heatable brick bed)/to bake/to dry by the heat of a fire
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head
variant of 熱乎乎|热乎乎[re4 hu1 hu1]
to warm oneself at a fire
(of clothes) to be soaked with sweat
to cook in a small quantity of water
